Description:
NPE when new a style with duplicate name
Build number:2.2.0.v200611230710

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a style styl1
2. New another style, input style1 as name and click Ok

Expected result:
Warning of duplicate style name exists

Actual result:
NPE.
